name: Death is required
description:
In this game, you play as a cube capable of moving and activating levers. Those levers rotate or move other cubes.

In order to win you must reach the green door which is initially blocked. To reach that door, you must activate levers and avoid deadly traps. Some levers might block you in, leaving you only one option, respawning by dying...

Developed by Oscar Valayé, for Wowie Jam 3, with the theme of “Failure is progress”. This game is my interpretation of this jam theme.

Disclaimer: I am not a graphist so expect a cubic game! :)
